Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway... You can't get your hands on
Cece-brand fashion unless you go
southeast to <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>.
But why go there when you can meet all
your fashion needs right here? We serve
both style AND quality!
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, excuse me! Do you need
something else?
Com_Talk_13: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>How many would you like to sell?
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome to Enchanted, my high-end
boutique!

You've barged in with barely a stitch on.
People around here are going to think
that's a pretty iffy decision.
But that's no business of mine! Anyhoo...


I'm certain even someone like you,
who has little care for clothing, will
find something you like here.
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Cece brand is a fashion phenomenon
that's getting attention all over Hyrule.

I can't believe such a hot brand came out
of <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> in Necluda...

Anyhoo, my little sister, Lasli, is on her
way there to study fashion!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But with her sense of direction, I hope
she gets there in one piece...
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Gosh, I couldn't buy that from you!
Com_Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Unconscious_01>Just one itty-bitty thing... Our <clr:0000>prices are
higher than normal <clr:ffff>right now. I need to
pay for Grandmother's medical treatment.
If my grandmother got better, I could go
back to the <clr:0000>original price<clr:ffff>...

But that's why that piece is <clr:0000><sp:2:10:2e:2800530068006f0070005f00530065006c006500630074004900740065006d0050007200690063006500ffff0001> rupees<clr:ffff>.
Just for now.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You'll buy it?! <sp:5:1:0>I...<sp:5:0:0> Thank you.


<sp:3:0:2:0300>If Grandmother gets better soon, please
let me <clr:0000>repay<clr:ffff> you.
Talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>situation at home<clr:ffff> is hard right now,
but we're family. We'll get through
it together.

you're currently wearing, hmm?<sp:5:0:0>

boutique!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Oh, it's you! Now that Grandmother's

<snd:Happy_00>The fashion world owes you a debt!
